whatIs.title: What is CompareHeights?
whatIs.description: CompareHeights is the ultimate online height comparison tool that allows you to visually compare the heights of celebrities, anime characters, historical figures, and custom individuals. Our platform makes understanding height differences intuitive, accurate, and fun for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that visualizing height differences should be simple, accurate, and accessible to everyone. Our mission is to provide the best height comparison experience by offering:

fast.title: Instant comparisons
fast.description: Create height comparison charts in seconds with real-time updates

intuitive.title: Easy-to-use interface
intuitive.description: No learning curve - start comparing heights immediately

advanced.title: Extensive database
advanced.description: Thousands of celebrities, characters, and figures with verified heights

flexible.title: Customizable charts
flexible.description: Full control over colors, backgrounds, and visual presentation

aiGeneration.title: Multi-Character Comparisons
aiGeneration.feature1: Compare unlimited characters side-by-side in one chart
aiGeneration.feature2: Support for metric and imperial units with instant conversion
aiGeneration.feature3: Visual scale from nanometers to kilometers

userFriendly.title: User-Friendly Experience
userFriendly.feature1: Clean, intuitive interface optimized for all devices
userFriendly.feature3: Seamless image upload and export workflow

pricing.title: Free to Use
pricing.feature1: Completely free basic features with no registration required
pricing.feature2: Save and share your height comparison projects

technology.title: Technology Stack
technology.description: CompareHeights is built with modern web technology:

aiModels.title: Database
aiModels.description: Extensive verified height database with regular updates

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Next.js 15 with React and TypeScript for smooth performance

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Secure sign-in with Google and GitHub for saving projects

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Fast, reliable cloud hosting for global accessibility

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform with new features and an expanding database of characters and celebrities.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Height comparison should be straightforward. We focus on intuitive design that anyone can use immediately.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Every feature is crafted with attention to detail to ensure accurate, beautiful height comparison charts.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We believe powerful visualization tools should be free and available to everyone, regardless of technical skill.

team.title: Team
team.description: CompareHeights is developed by a passionate team dedicated to making height visualization simple and accessible. We're committed to building the best height comparison tool for educators, content creators, and curious minds worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or need support? We'd love to hear from you!

footer.message: Join thousands of users who are already using CompareHeights to visualize and understand height differences. Start comparing today and explore the fascinating world of scale and proportion.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our AI image editing platform, need technical support, or want to share feedback, we're here to help.

primaryContact.title: Primary Contact
primaryContact.responseTime: Our team typically responds to inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

technical.title: Technical Support
technical.issue1: Issues with image uploads or processing

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Before reaching out, you might find answers to common questions:

q1.question: Q: I can't sign in to my account
q1.answer: A: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, or use an incognito/private window. If the issue persists, contact us with details about your browser and the error message.

q1.question: Q: How do credits work?
q1.answer: A: Credits are consumed based on the AI processing required. Text-to-image generation costs 10 credits, and additional features like custom aspect ratios cost extra credits.

q2.question: Q: Can I get a refund for unused credits?
q2.answer: A: Please contact us at drewgrant616@gmail.com to discuss refund requests on a case-by-case basis.

q1.question: Q: Why is my image taking so long to process?
q1.answer: A: AI image generation typically takes 30-60 seconds. High server demand may occasionally cause longer processing times.

q2.question: Q: What image formats are supported?
q2.answer: A: We support common formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP for uploads. Generated images are provided in PNG format.

urgent.label: Urgent issues
urgent.time: We aim to respond as quickly as possible

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.description: Our team is available to respond to emails:

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.description: Stay updated with the latest features and announcements:
socialMedia.follow: Follow us for product updates and tips

feedbackForm.title: Feedback Form
feedbackForm.description: We're working on an integrated feedback form to make it even easier to share your thoughts and suggestions.

office.title: Office Information
office.description: NanoEdit operates as a remote-first company, allowing us to focus on building the best AI image editing experience for our users worldwide.

footer.message: Your feedback and questions help us improve our platform and better serve the creative community.

export.exportFailed:
Image export failed. Possible reasons:
‚Ä¢ Image resource loading issues
‚Ä¢ Browser security restrictions

Suggested solutions:
1. Refresh the page and try again
2. Use browser screenshot function:
   - Chrome: F12 ‚Üí Ctrl+Shift+P ‚Üí Type "screenshot"
   - Or use system screenshot tool (Win+Shift+S)
export.downloadFailed: File download failed, please check browser download settings
